name: Lithium-blog
body:
### Lithium-Blog
This blog was created following the Lithium Quick Start Guide @ [http://lithify.me/docs/manual/quickstart](http://lithify.me/docs/manual/quickstart)
I've bootstrapped the template with [Twitter Bootstrap](http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/), [jQuery](https://github.com/jquery/jquery), and [jQuery UI](https://github.com/jquery/jquery-ui).
```
This repository was created using GitHub for Windows! Yaye!
```
So far this project is ran by just me, @fastmover .  If anybody else would be interested in committing updates, feel free to contact me.
tagline: A blog from scratch using the Lithium Quick Start Guide.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
